entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 a.m. ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 5:00 AM AST Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
